main.text: ğŸ  Welcome to Munich Property Finder!This bot is designed to help you find the perfect flat or house for rent or purchase in Munich. It uses the ImmoScout24 API to search for properties based on your search criteria and sends you notifications when new offers match your preferences.ğŸ“Œ You can set up multiple finders to search for different types of properties or different areas.

help_menu.text: ğŸ“š Help GuideğŸ  Main Menu â€¢ ğŸ‘¤ My Data - View your profile information â€¢ ğŸ” My Finders - View your active search filters â€¢ ğŸ˜ï¸ My Offers - View matched apartment offers â€¢ âš™ï¸ Settings - Adjust your preferences âš™ï¸ Settings â€¢ ğŸŒ Language - Change bot language â€¢ ğŸ“ Address - Set your preferred location â€¢ â• New Finder - Create apartment search filter â€¢ ğŸ”” Notifications - Toggle offer notifications â€¢ ğŸ—‘ï¸ Delete Finder - Remove search filters ğŸ“± Commands /start - Start/restart the bot /stop - Pause notifications â“ Need more help?
